key_risks: Client concentration risk with significant revenue dependency on top five clients
Economic sensitivity tied to clients' industries
High debt levels and financial leverage concerns
controversies: Labor practices and legal challenges, including NLRB cases and FLSA compliance issues
Data security breaches leading to reputational damage and client attrition
environmental_issues: Carbon neutrality goals and sustainable workplace practices in progress
social_issues: Labor disputes and allegations of unfair wages and working conditions
High employee turnover in certain regions
governance_issues: Compliance risks related to labor laws and data privacy regulations
